response.homeDescription:
Only double lot property on the historic West 11th Street. This hidden gem provides the ultimate retreat at the end of the day, perfectly suited for those seeking privacy. This modern home is in mint condition with over 5,000 sq/ft and a beautifully designed Japanese garden and a hand-made brick outdoor grill. The sophisticated master kitchen features all top of the line stainless steel appliances, granite counter top, induction cooktop, Italian made high end kitchen ventilation system. Every detail carefully planned and designed to maximize space and energy efficiency, no expense was spared in the meticulous renovation. Offering 5 bedrooms, 5.5 bath, 1 office, 2 living rooms, 2 kitchens, abundance of closets, oversized garden, 3 washer/dryer sets, dry sauna, indoor Jacuzzi tub, heated floors, central air, private terrace, French ceilings, 2 car parking garage plus additional 3 car driveway. Functions as a 2 family or single family home. Currently being used as a primary residence with an income generating suite. The beautiful clean lines and the combination of drama, intimacy and a touch of European class makes this one of the most unique townhouses in the entire borough of Brooklyn. Showings begin Mid-April 2015. BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. Contact exclusive listing agent: Alina Pogorelova at Engel & Voelkers NYC 347-515-0947
Brokers welcome.
